segments.text: I see the woman drying the plate, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit sad to see her so disconnected from what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the kids are sneaking cookies, but she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what she's thinking about, being so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene looks so calm from the outside, with the garden visible through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's a different story with water everywhere and kids being mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices the overflow soon before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how life can be so chaotic even in seemingly calm moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry seeing the mess and no one doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
